title: Dartmouth AI Conference
description: The birth of AI as a field â€” researchers gathered at Dartmouth College to explore the idea of machines simulating human intelligence.

title: The Perceptron
description: Frank Rosenblatt introduces the perceptron, one of the earliest neural network models.

title: IBM Deep Blue Defeats Garry Kasparov
description: IBM's Deep Blue becomes the first computer to defeat a reigning world chess champion in a match under standard chess tournament time controls.

title: ImageNet Breakthrough
description: AlexNet wins the ImageNet competition, drastically reducing error rates and proving the power of deep learning.

title: AlphaGo Defeats Lee Sedol
description: DeepMind's AlphaGo defeats world champion Lee Sedol in Go, showcasing AI's ability to master complex, intuition-based games.

title: ChatGPT Takes the World by Storm
description: OpenAI releases ChatGPT to the public, sparking massive interest in conversational AI.

title: Constitutional AI
description: Anthropic introduces Constitutional AI, a method for aligning AI models with human values using explicit principles.

title: Gemini 1.5 Release
description: Google DeepMind launches Gemini 1.5, showcasing massive context window capabilities.

title: GPT-5 Launch
description: OpenAI introduces GPT-5 with advanced reasoning, planning, and tool integration.
